text:
Hey all, here’s my breakdown of sessions that might interest developers for this final day of INBOUND. All times are in CDT.
• <https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/purpose-driven-seo-a-modern-seo-strategy-that-any-brand-can-deploy-in-2022|Purpose-Driven SEO: A Modern SEO Strategy That Any Brand Can Deploy In 2022> at 7 AM
• <https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/sitting-on-the-same-side-of-the-table-a-practical-guide-to-speaking-persuasively|Sitting on the Same Side of the Table: A Practical Guide To Speaking Persuasively> at 7 AM
• <https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/case-study-the-cayman-islands-covid-19-website-turning-clicks-into-changes-in-behavior|Case Study: The Cayman Islands COVID-19 Website - Turning Clicks Into Changes in Behavior> at 7:15 AM
• *<https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/what-it-takes-to-be-a-good-digital-citizen|What It Takes to Be a Good Digital Citizen>* with <https://www.inbound.com/2021/speakers/michelle-zatlyn|Michelle Zatlyn, Co-Founder, President & COO of Cloudflare> at 8 AM
• <https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/ama-HubSpot-portal-maintenance-with-gem-rugg-gunn-HubSpot-platform-consultant-at-babelquest|AMA: HubSpot Portal Maintenance With Gem Rugg-Gunn, HubSpot Platform Consultant at BabelQuest> at 8:45 AM
• *<https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/the-secret-ingredient-to-turning-your-passion-into-a-business|The Secret Ingredient to Turning Your Passion into a Business>* at 9:30 AM
• *<https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/data-trends-of-the-future|Data Trends of the Future>* at 11 AM
• <https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/interactive-cooking-with-assembly|Interactive: Cooking with Assembly> at 11:30 AM [what!? I love food]
• <https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/women-in-leadership|Meetup: Women in Leadership> at 11:30 AM (for those who identify as a woman who currently has a leadership role)
• *<https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/5g-and-the-tech-revolution|5G and the Tech Revolution>* with <https://www.inbound.com/2021/speakers/don-mcguire|Don McGuire, Chief Marketing Officer, Qualcomm Technologies, Inc.> at 12pm
• <https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/case-study-how-handled-aligned-teams-and-delivered-an-amazing-customer-experience-with-HubSpots-full-crm-platform|Case Study: How Handled Aligned Teams and Delivered an Amazing Customer Experience With HubSpot’s Full CRM Platform> at 12:45pm
• *<https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/inclusivity-is-not-exclusive|Inclusivity is Not Exclusive>* with <https://www.inbound.com/2021/speakers/judith-heumann|Judith Heumann, Author, Disability Rights Activist> and <https://www.inbound.com/2021/speakers/zach-okun|Zach Okun, Chief Product Officer, AudioEye, Inc.>
• <https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/how-to-scale-thought-leadership|How To Scale Thought Leadership> at 3:30pm
• *<https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/lessons-learned-on-the-road-to-success|Lessons Learned on the Road to Success>* - *Oprah Winfrey* at 4:30pm
Spotlight: *<https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/what-it-takes-to-be-a-good-digital-citizen|What It Takes to Be a Good Digital Citizen>* starts in 15 mins.
Spotlight: *<https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/the-secret-ingredient-to-turning-your-passion-into-a-business|The Secret Ingredient to Turning Your Passion into a Business>* starts in 15 minutes.
Spotlight: *<https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/data-trends-of-the-future|Data Trends of the Future>* starts in 15 mins.
Spotlight: *<https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/5g-and-the-tech-revolution|5G and the Tech Revolution>* starts in 15 minutes.
5g spotlight was interesting, felt like I knew most of what he was talking about already but was cool to hear it from their perspective.

I’m most excited for Inclusivity is not exclusive by Judith Heumann later today. The accessibility talk by the folks from AudioEye was fabulous. Lot of great info on a lot more topics than I was anticipating.
Will the talks that we missed be available after Inbound?
If you have the powerhouse pass yes the sessions will all be available for 1 year after INBOUND.
Spotlight: *<https://join.inbound.com/s/recI02ZKVCZUdRIxF|Inclusivity is Not Exclusive>* - starts in 15 minutes. I’m personally excited for this one.
I’m not crying, you’re crying!
not crying youre crying
such an awesome person, with such a great way of framing everything.

There are some awesome folks in our community that continue to share their knowledge and expertise. I want to call out <https://join.inbound.com/s/recsgzITC5n8amwTD|How to Scale Thought Leadership> as being an awesome talk. I think many folks in here would find it useful.

If you miss it live but have a powerhouse pass, I recommend watching it on-demand.
I see you <@UCH1L597V> and the MakeWebBetter team dominating the INBOUND topic chats :wink: nice! hope you guys are seeing some good results and conversations.

Also just wanted to say props to <@U7ADCU3BM> on this awesome score on lighthouse. (shared in his topic chat in INBOUND)
<https://lighthouse-dot-webdotdevsite.appspot.com//lh/html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gonzalotorreras.com%2F>
Spotlight: *<https://join.inbound.com/s/rec85UGvTqSoZoSaN|Lessons Learned on the Road to Success>* with Oprah Winfrey starts in 15 minutes.

Thanks Jon!
Seems like I missed all the fun here (just joined the channel!).
Late to the party award!
<https://media.giphy.com/media/3o7ZeQBhbVGnELP4bK/giphy.gif|Oprah - you get a gif!>
Similar to my post about thought leadership, Oprah’s talk hits on a lot of that. Very deep. Lots of behind the scenes of how she and the Oprah show worked.

Well, that’s a wrap for live sessions!

Powerhouse pass holders you can go back and catch any sessions you missed in the on-demand area.

We’ll have developer focused content at <https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-HubSpot-global-presents-developer-day-2021/|Developer Day 2021> make sure to register!
